decisions_and_tradeoffs: Audit evidence gate fails hard if evidence missing or stale - ensures workspace integrity enforcement is not bypassed
HTTP /tasks endpoint uses simple shim pattern - FastAPI preferred but http.server fallback ensures compatibility without dependencies
Work distribution uses simultaneous execution mode - all agents start immediately, coordination via checkpoints rather than sequential dependencies
Closure validator requires audit evidence file path - enables cross-checking timestamp vs closure time without breaking existing validation flow
